Thursday, September 11, 2025 Sign in / Join About Foodie Faves Interviews Food Travels Recipes Contact Facebook Instagram Twitter Vimeo Youtube Tasty Chomps A Local's Culinary Guide Home About About Us Media/Press Newsletter Archives Holiday Dining Food Guides Favorite Restaurants Videos Recipes Interviews Brunch Best Bets Happy Hour Travels Hotels Florida St Augustine South Florida Miami Tampa St.Petersburg Sarasota London Hong Kong Vietnam New York City Atlanta Contact Specials More Search New Elevated Sunday Brunch Buffet at AC Sky Bar in Downtown Orlando By Ricky Ly Oct 23, 2024 In Orlando Share Facebook Twitter Pinterest WhatsApp Linkedin ReddIt Print 4589 ORLANDO! Did you know there is a new Rooftop Brunch Buffet in Downtown Orlando? Join AC Sky Bar at AC Hotelevery Sunday for Sunday Brunch, featuring a special seasonal chef inspired buffet brunch menu and Live DJ entertainment. The new brunch features a seasonally inspired chef driven farm to table menu, with new rotating dishes created by their chef weekly. Against the backdrop of boundless city views, guests at the hotel’s Sky Bar Rooftop Terrace can also enjoy Spanish-inspired tapas and bites, artisanal cocktails, and local craft brews from its 18th floor. Plus giveaway on Instagram ! Tell us what makes AC Sky Bar a special place? The AC sky bar has the best panoramic views in Orlando. An award winning craft cocktail program, the signature AC Spanish inspired food menu all with local flair and passionate staff. We support local vendors, artists and musicians. Our people make the AC shine. They truly care about the customer experience! What can people expect from this new brunch? Why should they choose AC Sky Bar to brunch? The new brunch features a seasonally inspired chef driven farm to table menu. It is created by our chef weekly. There are a variety of seasonal dishes to choose from along with bottomless mimosas for an additional charge. All with the best views in Orlando! What are the most popular items right now on the brunch menu? Waffles have been a huge hit, chefs braised coq au vin, made to order omelets and our weekly creations Tell us about any other upcoming plans for the hotel and the restaurant as we head into the holidays? We have recently launched our Monday night football promotion and also we are partnering with Jackson Family wines and the Orlando Magic on an event we are calling “blue lights nights” – every Orlando Magic home game ! AC Elevated Buffet Brunch – Sample Menu Sunday’s-11:00am-3:00pm $34.95 per person     $19.95 kids under 12 Bottomless Mimosas- $20 per person Cold Buffet Items Fresh Strawberries and Blueberries Seasonal Sliced Fresh Melons Assorted AC Charcuterie of meats and cheeses Smoked Salmon with garniture Yogurt parfaits Fresh Juices Fresh Baked Croissants Fresh baked petite Danish Assorted muffins Fresh baked scones Seasonal Salad (rotates weekly) Poached Shrimp with cocktail sauce and lemon Hot Buffet Items (Three Breakfast items rotates weekly) Croissant French toast casserole with maple syrup Egg and vegetable frittata Bacon, sausage, Ham (breakfast meat rotates weekly) (Three lunch items rotates weekly) Potatoes O’Brien (potatoes/starch rotates weekly) Chicken Florentine Beef Brigolé roasted tomato demi-glace and salsa roja Action Stations Fresh made to order omelets with assorted ingredients Made to order waffles with syrup and assorted toppings Desserts Caramel Flan Cinnamon Churros with chocolate and caramel sauce Assorted Cakes & Pies Assorted Dessert Shooters *bottomless mimosas may be added to any brunch for $20.00 AC Sky Bar at AC Hotel 333 S Garland Ave Floor 18, Orlando, FL 32801 https://www.opentable.com/r/ac-sky-bar-orlando Visit acskybar.com for more information Voted Best Rooftop Bar 2023 & 2024 by Orlando Weekly Share Facebook Twitter Pinterest WhatsApp Linkedin ReddIt Print Must Read Pumpkin Season at Metro Diner Returns with Pumpkin Pancakes, Waffles, and Bread Pudding Ricky Ly - Recap of the OIFW Decades Spotlight Celebration at AC Sky Bar | Orlando International Fashion Week Admin@OIFW.org HOME REGISTER BRAND/DESIGNER REGISTRATION MODEL APPLICATION CASTING REGISTRATION VENDOR VOLUNTEER PHOTOGRAPHER REGISTRATION SCHOLARSHIP ABOUT SPONSORSHIP NEWS HISTORY Summer 2025 Fall 2024 Summer 2024 Fall 2023 HOME REGISTER BRAND/DESIGNER REGISTRATION MODEL APPLICATION CASTING REGISTRATION VENDOR VOLUNTEER PHOTOGRAPHER REGISTRATION SCHOLARSHIP ABOUT SPONSORSHIP NEWS HISTORY Summer 2025 Fall 2024 Summer 2024 Fall 2023 14 November Recap of the OIFW Decades Spotlight Celebration at AC Sky Bar By admin No comments 1 like News , Press Releases The Decades Spotlight Celebration on November 13th was an extraordinary evening at the stunning AC Sky Bar at the AC Hotel Orlando Downtown. The venue, perched high above the city, offered breathtaking views of downtown Orlando, setting the perfect backdrop for a night of celebration, networking, and recognition. The staff at AC Sky Bar were incredibly kind, welcoming, and accommodating, ensuring guests had an unforgettable experience. This exclusive event brought together many of the movers and shakers in Orlando, including key business owners and influential figures from various industries. Notable attendees included Shanti Persaud of WOKB Radio , Deisi Del Toro , owner of Del Toro Tequila & Melt on This Movie and the Follywood Awards , Beverly Page of Clare and The Chocolate Nutcracker , which will be showcased at the Dr. Phillips Performing Arts Center on November 30th, Guenet and Sam Roberts of Caribbean American Passport Magazine , Christina Carmona of Bad Kitty Films , Edward Tapia , an international model, reality TV star, and singer, and Tino Patel , Digital Creator. The Decades Spotlight Celebration also featured a dynamic crowd of OIFW’s Board Members and Team Members who continue to drive the event’s success. Nadege Ngongo-Wilson and Anelya Alimnova , international fashion and makeup influencers, are board members who have significantly impacted the beauty and fashion industries. Tony and Kristi from Bang & Olufsen Orlando are also part of the OIFW board, bringing their passion for design and innovation to the event. Rosanna Tran , Starr Dalton , Jessica Henlon , and Rob Henlon also attended, contributing to the event’s growth and success. OIFW team members in attendance included Cheryl Thomas , whose dedication to ensuring the event’s success is invaluable. The evening was further highlighted by the presence of models DJ Telford , Kathleen Marinez , and Alex Da Silva Anton (Mr. Brazil/USA 2022 ), who added to the event’s glamour. A special thank you goes out to all the other guests who attended, many of whom weren’t mentioned by name but whose presence made the night even more special. Your support continues to help make OIFW a standout event in the Orlando community, and we are grateful for your participation. The Decades Spotlight Celebration was a beautiful occasion to celebrate the incredible people behind OIFW and a testament to the vibrant, diverse community that continues to support the growth of fashion and culture in Orlando. As the event wrapped up, it was clear that OIFW’s impact is growing both locally and internationally, and the momentum heading into the rest of the week’s events is palpable. Looking Ahead to OIFW 2024 As OIFW 2024 continues, here is the schedule for the remaining events: Thursday, November 14 – FEN Social (Sponsor Event) Location: Aloft Orlando Downtown Time: 6:00 PM Fashion Show: Vedremo by Valerie Capuzzi , Villa Vault Couture by Sharon Ward Art & Style Segment: Kerry Art by Kerry Harripersad Emcee: Ashleigh Mausser Performances by MEKA @mekafromthe703 and Marquis Lee, Diverse Word DJ: Red Tables Saturday, November 16 – Rooftop Party & Fashion Show Location: Altira Pool + Lounge Time: 1:00 PM Fashion Show: Overchill the Label by Olivia Myers , SimAllure Boutique by Simone Davis , Solicia Collection by Yvette Solis Emcees: Danielle Cohn & Charisma Tran Performance by Scott Barnhill DJ: TL Smooth Sunday, November 17 – Kids & Teens Show Location: Grand Bohemian Hotel Orlando Time: 1:00 PM Fashion Show: Purple Dragonfly by Anita Cleveland , Choupette by Ayman Damyan , My Little Matilda by Savina Rey (Kids and Teens) Emcee: Nathalie Vallieres Martin Performance: Avalon Dance DJ: TL Smooth Partner: Central Florida Lifestyle Magazine Sunday, November 17 – Fashion Night Out (FNO) Closing Shows Location: Grand Bohemian Hotel Orlando 5:00 PM Show: Fashion Show: Labelle Since 1919 , Karina Torres , SHARY Online Boutique by Yahaira Almedina , Beaux Studios , Ingrid Tu Variedad Boutique Emcee: Christina Carmona DJ: TL Smooth 7:00 PM Show: Fashion Show: Hihabibi by Mosab , DePalma by Vanessa Salazar , Galana Handmade Jewelry by AnaGabriel Galan (from Costa Rica) , Artelio by Arquelio Rivera , Majestic by Bouchra Hida , SimAllure Boutique by Simone Davis , Aline Moreno (from Mexico) Emcees: Michelle Imperato & Jason Guy DJ: TL Smooth Stay tuned for more highlights as OIFW 2024 continues to inspire and connect the fashion industry’s top talent! Share Opening Show Recap: A Night of Fashion, Art, and Celebration at OIFW 2024 Previous post A Recap of FEN Social Presented by Fierce Entertainment: A Night of Networking, Fashion, and Art at OIFW 2024 Next post Related Posts OIFW Announces New Board Members and Updates for Summer 2025 Orlando International Fashion Week (OIFW) Announces Summer 2025 Dates and Black Friday Deals Recap of OIFW 2024 Shows on November 17th: A Day of Fashion, Talent, and Unforgettable Moments The Team Jessica Henlon, MA Rob Henlon, MA Starr Dalton Rosanna Tran Anelya Alim Lana Light

Home Menu Events Calendar Private Events House Rules Contact Us Book An Event AC SKY BAR Reserve Now Orlando's Award-Winning Rooftop Bar Welcome to AC Sky Bar, where dining reaches new heights in the heart of downtown Orlando. 

Perched atop the city skyline, our rooftop bar offers breathtaking views that provide the perfect backdrop for an unforgettable dining experience.

Whether you're enjoying a romantic evening under the stars or celebrating with friends against the backdrop of the city lights, our rooftop bar provides the ideal setting for any occasion. Voted Best Rooftop Bar 
2023 & 2024 Open Hours Monday  4:00P - 11:00P 
Tuesday  - Thursday 11:00A - 11:00P
Friday - Saturday 11:00A - 12:00A Sunday  11:00 AM - 11:00P Group Dining & Private Events Inquiries âElevate your dining experience to new heights at AC Sky Bar, where every sip is crafted with excellence and every moment is elevated.â Joseph Delgado - General Manager Discover the Menu WINE DOWN WEDNESDAYS Unwind above the city with Wine Down Wednesday at AC Hotel Sky Bar! Enjoy a curated selection of three reds, three whites, and one sparkling wine, expertly poured at your table. 

For just $25+ per person, you can sip and savor while exploring perfect pairings from our special menu. A dedicated team will ensure a seamless experience, with a rinse station available for fresh pours. 

Join us and toast to the perfect evening! RESERVE A TABLE Reservations Reservations are not required but are strongly encouraged! Find a Table Contacts: 333 S. Garland Ave

AC Sky Bar - Rooftop bar in Orlando | The Rooftop Guide Rooftop Bars Europe North America Central America & Caribbean South America Asia Middle East Oceania Africa Rooftop Pools Inspiration Sign up North America Rooftop bars in Orlando Orlando rooftop bar AC Sky Bar $ $ $ $ $ 18th floor Downtown Images belong to the bar Last updated: June 15, 2024 AC Sky Bar Rooftop Bar Orlando 360Â° over Orlando Tapas Year round No Overview Modern and elevated rooftop lounge in downtown Orlando. The fabulous AC Hotel By Marriott Orlando Downtown comes with an elevated and buzzing hot-spot, called AC Sky Bar. Set in the heart of downtown, the modern rooftop bar and restaurant offers an interior with floor-to-ceiling windows, as well as a stylish outside terrace, all surrounded with panoramic 360Â° views over Orlando. High above the frenzy below, the AC Sky Bar serves a wide range of Spanish-inspired tapas-style small plates and bites, as well as artisanal cocktails, local craft brews, and an international wine list. Mainly a venue where a trendy crowd enjoy nightly fun, from sunset and pre-game drinks to twinkling night caps. But, the rooftop is also open for Sunday brunch, with everything from Avocado & Egg Toast to Mimosa and Elevated Bloody Mary. Watch Location & Map 333 S Garland Ave, Orlando, FL 32801 Contact +1 407-635-2300 sales@acorlandodowntown.com Visit website Facebook Instagram Opening Hours Monday: 16.00 - 23.00 Tuesday: 11.00 - 23.00 Wednesday: 11.00 - 23.00 Thursday: 11.00 - 23.00 Friday: 11.00 - 00.00 Saturday: 11.00 - 00.00 Sunday: 11.00 - 23.00 FAQ What is the AC Sky Bar dress code? The AC Sky Bar dress code is smart casual. What food does AC Sky Bar serve? AC Sky Bar serves Spanish-inspired tapas-style small plates. Rating By: Rikard Fredricson Rikard has spent the last 10 years exploring, enjoying, researching and working with rooftop venues. During these years he has visited more than 700 rooftops across the globe. The experience he has gained is used to create helpful, in-depth and accessible content, and to share his knowledge and rooftop expertise with fellow rooftop-lovers. High Tide High Tide is a tropical rooftop bar perched on the third floor of the nightlife complex Church Street Bars.
